titleInfo.title: State of Tennessee vs. Harper Vaughan, Capias

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

subject.topic: Vaughan, Harper; Smith, F.B.; Rolls, G.G.; Townsen, J.A.

mods.note: A subpoena from the case of the State of Tennessee vs. Harper Vaughan. Issued and signed by Clerk F.B. Smith, the subpoena orders G.G. Rolls, Sheriff of Stewart County, to take Vaughan into custody and bring him before the Circuit Court to answer a charge of tippling on Election day. Deputy Sheriff J.A. Townsen received and executed the subpoena on behalf of Sheriff Rolls.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Created and edited in general conformance to MODS Guidelines (Version 3.5).
